data: Dr. Robert J. Perry Dr. Robert J. Perry Dr. Robert J. Perry Professor and Vice Chair for Undergraduate Studies perry.6@osu.edu 614-397-1031 1040L Physics Research Building Nuclear Theory Renormalization Group Ph.D. Physics - University of Maryland, College Park 1984 B.A. in Liberal Arts - St. John's College, Annapolis 1978 Brief CV: http://www.physics.ohio-state.edu/briefcvs/perry_briefcv.pdf Fellow, American Physical Society - 1999 Distinguished University Service Award (OSU) -2001 Fellow, American Association for the Advancement of Science - 2007 Alumni Distinguished Teaching Award (OSU) - 2008
